static void addnoise ( dmat *  A,
mt_state *  rstat,
const double  bkgrnd,
const double  pcalib,
const double  rne 
) [static]

add photon and read out noise.

pcaclib part of bkgrnd is calibrated out. set to 1 usually. 

00032                               {
00033     for(int ix=0; ix<A->nx*A->ny; ix++){
00034     A->p[ix]=randp(rstat,A->p[ix]+bkgrnd)
00035         -bkgrnd*pcalib+rne*randn(rstat);
00036     }
00037 }

void ngsmod2wvf ( cmat *  wvf,
double  wvl,
const dmat *  modm,
const LOC_T *  cloc,
double  fpc,
double  thetax,
double  thetay,
const PARMS_S *  parms 
)

convert mod vector to ngs WFS cloc and add to it's opd or complex pupil function.

Input/Output: wvf (complex pupil function). Input: wvl: wavelength. modm: the mode vector cloc: the subaperture coarse sampled loc. fpc: focus piston coupling. (mean(x^2+y^2) to eliminate piston term in focus) thetax, thetay: direction of WFS. parms: parms

Parameters:
[in,out] wvf complex pupil function
[in] wvl the wavelength
[in] modm the NGS mode vector
[in] cloc the subaperture coarse sampled loc
[in] fpc focus piston coupling. (mean(x^2+y^2) to eliminate piston term in focus)
[in] thetax direction of WFS
[in] thetay direction of WFS
[in] parms the parms 
00060          {
00061     const double *locx=cloc->locx;
00062     const double *locy=cloc->locy;
00063     const long nloc=cloc->nloc;
00064     const double *mod=modm->p;
00065     const dcomplex ik=2*M_PI/wvl*I;
00066     if(modm->nx==2){
00067     for(int iloc=0; iloc<nloc; iloc++){
00068         double tmp=locx[iloc]*mod[0]+locy[iloc]*mod[1];
00069         wvf->p[iloc]*=cexp(ik*tmp);
00070     }
00071     }else{
00072     const double hc=parms->maos.hc;
00073     const double hs=parms->maos.hs;
00074     const double scale=pow(1.-hc/hs, -2);
00075     const double scale1=1.-scale;
00076     for(int iloc=0; iloc<nloc; iloc++){
00077         double x=locx[iloc];
00078         double y=locy[iloc];
00079         double xy=x*y;
00080         double x2=x*x;
00081         double y2=y*y;
00082         double tmp= locx[iloc]*mod[0]
00083         +locy[iloc]*mod[1]
00084         +mod[2]*((x2+y2-fpc)*scale1-2*scale*hc*(thetax*x+thetay*y))
00085         +mod[3]*((x2-y2)*scale1 - 2*scale*hc*(thetax*x-thetay*y))
00086         +mod[4]*(xy*scale1-scale*hc*(thetay*x+thetax*y));
00087         wvf->p[iloc]*=cexp(ik*tmp);
00088     }
00089     }
00090 }

dcell* skysim_ztilt ( dmat *  mideal,
ASTER_S *  aster,
const PARMS_S *  parms 
)

ztilt time domain noise free simulation at LGS sampling freq.

Written: 2010-06-09 Tested OK: 2010-06-10 

00098                                                                        {
00099     const double gain=parms->skyc.intgain;
00100     const int nmod=mideal->nx;
00101     dmat *mint=NULL;        //integrator output.
00102     dmat *mreal=NULL;       //modal correction at this step.
00103     dmat *merr=dnew(nmod,1);//modal error
00104     dmat *merrm=NULL;       //measured model error
00105     PDMAT(mideal,pmideal);
00106     dcell *mres=dcellnew(1,aster->nstep);//residual mode.
00107     dmat *grad=NULL;
00108     dmat *pgm=aster->pgm->p[aster->pgm->nx-1];
00109     for(int istep=0; istep<aster->nstep; istep++){
00110     memcpy(merr->p, pmideal[istep], nmod*sizeof(double));
00111     dadd(&merr, 1, mreal, -1);//form error;
00112     dcp(&mres->p[istep],merr);//record error.
00113     dzero(grad);
00114     dmm(&grad, aster->gm, merr, "nn", 1);
00115     int itsa=0;
00116     for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00117         const int ipowfs=aster->wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00118         const long nsa=parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs];
00119         for(long isa=0; isa<nsa*2; isa++){
00120         grad->p[isa+itsa]+=aster->wfs[iwfs].ztiltout->p[istep]->p[isa];
00121         }
00122         itsa+=nsa*2;
00123     }
00124     dzero(merrm);
00125     dmm(&merrm, pgm, grad, "nn", 1);
00126     
00127     //Servo filter.
00128     dcp(&mreal, mint);//integrator output from last step.
00129     dadd(&mint, 1, merrm, gain);//integrator;
00130     }
00131     dfree(mint); dfree(mreal); dfree(merr); dfree(merrm);dfree(grad);
00132     return mres;
00133 }

dmat* skysim_phy ( dmat **  mresout,
SIM_S *  simu,
ASTER_S *  aster,
POWFS_S *  powfs,
const PARMS_S *  parms,
int  idtrat,
int  noisy,
int  demotettf 
)

Time domain physical simulation.

noisy:

  • 0: no noise at all;
  • 1: poisson and read out noise.
  • 2: only poisson noise. 
00144                                               {
00145     int dtrat=parms->skyc.dtrats[idtrat];
00146     const int nmod=simu->mideal->nx;
00147     PDMAT(simu->mideal,pmideal);
00148     PDMAT(simu->mideal_oa, pmideal_oa);
00149     dmat *res=dnew(6,1);/*Results. 1-2: NGS and TT modes., 
00150               3-4:On axis NGS and TT modes,
00151               4-6: On axis NGS and TT wihtout considering un-orthogonality.*/

00153     dmat *merr=dnew(nmod,1);//modal error
00154     dmat *merrm=NULL;//measured model error
00155     
00156     dmat *mres=dnew(nmod,aster->nstep);

00158     PDMAT(parms->skyc.rnefs,rnefs);

00160     dmat *zgrad=dnew(aster->tsa*2,1);
00161     dmat *grads=dnew(aster->tsa*2,aster->nstep);
00162     dmat *zgrads=dnew(aster->tsa*2,aster->nstep);

00165     ccell *wvfc=ccellnew(aster->nwfs,1);
00166     dcell **mtche=calloc(aster->nwfs, sizeof(dcell*));
00167     dcell **ints=calloc(aster->nwfs, sizeof(dcell*));
00168     ccell *otf=ccellnew(aster->nwfs,1);
00169     SERVO_S *st2t=calloc(1, sizeof(SERVO_S));
00170     double ngsol=simu->rmsol->p[0];
00171     //dcell *neasim=dcellnew(aster->nwfs,1);//Confirmed that neasim is close to estimated.
00172     const double dtngs=parms->maos.dt*dtrat;
00173     const long nwvl=parms->maos.nwvl;
00174     dmat *pgm;
00175     if(demotettf){
00176     pgm=aster->pgmtt->p[idtrat];
00177     if(!pgm){
00178         warning("Demoting is forbidden\n");
00179         pgm=aster->pgm->p[idtrat];
00180     }
00181     }else{
00182     pgm=aster->pgm->p[idtrat];
00183     }
00184     //if(parms->skyc.dbg && parms->skyc.phystart<aster->nstep){
00185     //  mymkdir("%s/ints",dirsetup);
00186     //}
00187     for(long iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00188     const int ipowfs=aster->wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00189     const long ncomp=parms->maos.ncomp[ipowfs];
00190     const long nsa=parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs];
00191     wvf->p[iwfs]=cnew(ncomp,ncomp);
00192     wvfc->p[iwfs]=cnew(ncomp/2,ncomp/2);
00193     psf[iwfs]=dcellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00194     cfft2plan(wvf->p[iwfs], -1);
00195     mtche[iwfs]=aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat->mtche[idtrat];
00196     otf->p[iwfs]=cnew(ncomp,ncomp);
00197     cfft2plan(otf->p[iwfs],-1);
00198     cfft2plan(otf->p[iwfs],1);
00199     ints[iwfs]=dcellnew(nsa,1);
00200     int pixpsa=parms->skyc.pixpsa[ipowfs];
00201     for(long isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00202         ints[iwfs]->p[isa]=dnew(pixpsa,pixpsa);
00203     }
00204 
00205     }
00206     int phycount=0;
00207     for(int istep=0; istep<aster->nstep; istep++){
00208     memcpy(merr->p, pmideal[istep], nmod*sizeof(double));
00209     dadd(&merr, 1, mreal, -1);//form NGS mode error;
00210 
00211     if(istep>=parms->skyc.evlstart){
00212         double res_ngs=dwdot(merr->p,parms->maos.mcc,merr->p);
00213         if(res_ngs>ngsol*5){
00214         //warning2("%5.1f Hz: loop diverged. \n", parms->skyc.fss[idtrat]);
00215         dfree(res); res=NULL;
00216         break;
00217         }
00218         {
00219         res->p[0]+=res_ngs;
00220         res->p[1]+=dwdot2(merr->p,parms->maos.mcc_tt,merr->p);
00221         double dot_oa=dwdot(merr->p, parms->maos.mcc_oa, merr->p);
00222         double dot_res_ideal=dwdot(merr->p, parms->maos.mcc_oa, pmideal[istep]);
00223         double dot_res_oa=0;
00224         for(int imod=0; imod<nmod; imod++){
00225             dot_res_oa+=merr->p[imod]*pmideal_oa[istep][imod];
00226         }
00227         res->p[2]+=dot_oa-2*dot_res_ideal+2*dot_res_oa;
00228         res->p[4]+=dot_oa;
00229         }
00230         {
00231         double dot_oa_tt=dwdot2(merr->p, parms->maos.mcc_oa_tt, merr->p);
00232         //Notice that mcc_oa_tt2 is 2x5 marix.
00233         double dot_res_ideal_tt=dwdot(merr->p, parms->maos.mcc_oa_tt2, pmideal[istep]);
00234         double dot_res_oa_tt=0;
00235         for(int imod=0; imod<2; imod++){
00236             dot_res_oa_tt+=merr->p[imod]*pmideal_oa[istep][imod];
00237         }
00238         res->p[3]+=dot_oa_tt-2*dot_res_ideal_tt+2*dot_res_oa_tt;
00239         res->p[5]+=dot_oa_tt;
00240         }
00241     }
00242     memcpy(pmres[istep],merr->p,sizeof(double)*nmod);
00243     
00244     if(istep<parms->skyc.phystart){
00245         //Ztilt, noise free simulation for acquisition.
00246         if(istep % dtrat == 0){
00247         dzero(zgrad);
00248         }
00249         dmm(&zgrad, aster->gm, merr, "nn", 1);//grad due to residual NGS mode.
00250         int itsa=0;
00251         for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00252         const int ipowfs=aster->wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00253         const long nsa=parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs];
00254         for(long isa=0; isa<nsa*2; isa++){//add ztilt.
00255             zgrad->p[isa+itsa]+=aster->wfs[iwfs].ztiltout->p[istep]->p[isa];
00256         }
00257         itsa+=nsa*2;
00258         }
00259         dcp(&mreal, st2t->mint);
00260         if((istep+1) % dtrat == 0){//has output
00261         dscale(zgrad, 1./dtrat);//averaging gradients.
00262         dzero(merrm);
00263         dmm(&merrm, pgm, zgrad, "nn", 1);
00264         memcpy(zgrads->p+istep*aster->tsa*2, zgrad->p, sizeof(double)*aster->tsa*2);
00265         switch(parms->skyc.servo){
00266         case 1:
00267             dadd(&st2t->mint, 1, merrm, 0.3);
00268             break;
00269         case 2:
00270             servo_typeII_filter(st2t, merrm, dtngs, aster->gain->p[idtrat]);
00271             break;
00272         default:
00273             error("Invalid\n");
00274         }
00275         }
00276     }else{
00277         if(istep % dtrat == 0){
00278         for(long iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00279             dcellzero(psf[iwfs]);
00280         }
00281         }
00282         for(long iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00283         const double thetax=aster->wfs[iwfs].thetax;
00284         const double thetay=aster->wfs[iwfs].thetay;
00285         const int ipowfs=aster->wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00286         const long nsa=parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs];
00287         PCCELL(aster->wfs[iwfs].wvfout[istep],wvfout);
00288         for(long iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00289             double wvl=parms->maos.wvl[iwvl];
00290             for(long isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00291             ccp(&wvfc->p[iwfs], wvfout[iwvl][isa]);
00292             //Apply NGS mode error to PSF.
00293             ngsmod2wvf(wvfc->p[iwfs], wvl, merr, powfs[ipowfs].cloc[isa],
00294                    powfs[ipowfs].fpc[isa], thetax, thetay, parms);
00295             cembed(wvf->p[iwfs],wvfc->p[iwfs],0,C_FULL);
00296             cfft2(wvf->p[iwfs],-1);
00297             cabs22d(&psf[iwfs]->p[isa+nsa*iwvl], 1., wvf->p[iwfs], 1.);//peak in corner.
00298             }//isa
00299         }//iwvl
00300         }//iwfs
00301         dcp(&mreal, st2t->mint);
00302         if((istep+1) % dtrat == 0){//has output
00303         phycount++;
00304         //Form detector image
00305         double igrad[2];
00306         int itsa=0;
00307         for(long iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00308             dcellzero(ints[iwfs]);
00309             const int ipowfs=aster->wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00310             const long nsa=parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs];
00311             for(long isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00312             for(long iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00313                 double siglev=aster->wfs[iwfs].siglev[iwvl];
00314                 ccpd(&otf->p[iwfs],psf[iwfs]->p[isa+nsa*iwvl]);
00315                 cifft2(otf->p[iwfs], 1); //turn to OTF, peak in corner
00316                 ccwm(otf->p[iwfs], powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].nominal);
00317                 cfft2(otf->p[iwfs], -1);
00318                 spmulcreal(ints[iwfs]->p[isa]->p, powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].si, 
00319                        otf->p[iwfs]->p, siglev);
00320             }
00321         
00322             //Add noise and apply matched filter.
00323             switch(noisy){
00324             case 0://no noise at all.
00325                 break;
00326             case 1://both poisson and read out noise.
00327                 addnoise(ints[iwfs]->p[isa], &aster->rand, aster->wfs[iwfs].bkgrnd*dtrat,
00328                      1, rnefs[ipowfs][idtrat]);
00329                 break;
00330             case 2://there is still poisson noise.
00331                 addnoise(ints[iwfs]->p[isa], &aster->rand, 0, 1, 0);
00332                 break;
00333             default:
00334                 error("Invalid noisy\n");
00335             }
00336             for(long ix=0; ix<ints[iwfs]->p[isa]->nx*ints[iwfs]->p[isa]->ny; ix++){
00337                 if(ints[iwfs]->p[isa]->p[ix]<0){
00338                 ints[iwfs]->p[isa]->p[ix]=0;
00339                 }
00340             }
00341             igrad[0]=0;
00342             igrad[1]=0;
00343             if(parms->skyc.mtch){
00344                 dmulvec(igrad, mtche[iwfs]->p[isa], ints[iwfs]->p[isa]->p, 1);
00345             }else{
00346                 double imax=dmax(ints[iwfs]->p[isa]);
00347                 dcog(igrad, ints[iwfs]->p[isa], 0, 0, 0.1*imax, 0.1*imax); 
00348                 igrad[0]*=parms->skyc.pixtheta[ipowfs];
00349                 igrad[1]*=parms->skyc.pixtheta[ipowfs];
00350             }
00351             grad->p[isa+itsa]=igrad[0];
00352             grad->p[isa+nsa+itsa]=igrad[1];
00353         
00354             }//isa
00355             itsa+=nsa*2;
00356             //if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00357             //      dcellwrite(ints[iwfs],"%s/ints/ints_aster%d_iwfs%d_istep%d",
00358             //         dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs,istep);
00359             //}
00360 
00361         }//iwfs
00362         dzero(merrm);
00363         dmm(&merrm, pgm, grad, "nn", 1);
00364         memcpy(grads->p+istep*aster->tsa*2, grad->p, sizeof(double)*aster->tsa*2);
00365         switch(parms->skyc.servo){
00366         case 1:
00367             dadd(&st2t->mint, 1, merrm, 0.5);
00368             break;
00369         case 2:
00370             servo_typeII_filter(st2t, merrm, dtngs, aster->gain->p[idtrat]);
00371             break;
00372         default:
00373             error("Invalid\n");
00374         }
00375         }//if dtrat
00376     }//if phystart
00377     }//istep;
00378     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00379     dwrite(zgrads,"%s/skysim_zgrads_aster%d_dtrat%d",dirsetup,aster->iaster,dtrat);
00380     dwrite(grads,"%s/skysim_grads_aster%d_dtrat%d",dirsetup, aster->iaster,dtrat);
00381     }
00382   
00383     dfree(mreal);
00384     dfree(merr);
00385     dfree(merrm);
00386     dfree(grad);
00387     dfree(zgrad);
00388     dfree(grads);//////////////remove this dmat after debugging
00389     dfree(zgrads);//////////////remove this dmat debugging
00390     for(long iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00391     dcellfree(psf[iwfs]);
00392     dcellfree(ints[iwfs]);
00393     }
00394     ccellfree(wvf);
00395     ccellfree(wvfc);
00396     ccellfree(otf);
00397     dfree(st2t->mint);
00398     dfree(st2t->mintfirst);
00399     dfree(st2t->merrlast);
00400     dfree(st2t->mlead);
00401     free(st2t);
00402     free(psf);
00403     free(mtche);
00404     free(ints);
00405     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00406     dwrite(mres,"%s/skysim_phy_mres_aster%d_%d",dirsetup,aster->iaster,dtrat);
00407     }
00408     //dfree(mres);
00409     *mresout=mres;
00410     dscale(res, 1./(aster->nstep-parms->skyc.evlstart));
00411     return res;
00412 }

void skysim_save ( SIM_S *  simu,
ASTER_S *  aster,
double *  ipres,
int  selaster,
int  seldtrat,
int  isky 
)

Save NGS WFS and other information for later use in MAOS simulations.

00457     fprintf(fp, " %.2f", aster[selaster].wfs[iwfs].siglevtot);
00458     }
00459     fprintf(fp,"]\n");
00460     fprintf(fp,"wfs.wvlwts=[1 1 1 1 1 1");
00461     for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<aster[selaster].nwfs; iwfs++){
00462     for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00463         fprintf(fp," %.2f ", aster[selaster].wfs[iwfs].siglev[iwvl]
00464             /aster[selaster].wfs[iwfs].siglevtot);
00465     }
00466     }
00467     fprintf(fp,"]\n");
00468     fprintf(fp,"wfs.powfs=[0 0 0 0 0 0");
00469     for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<aster[selaster].nwfs; iwfs++){
00470     fprintf(fp, " %d", aster[selaster].wfs[iwfs].ipowfs+1);
00471     }
00472     fprintf(fp,"]\n");
00473     fprintf(fp,"sim.seeds=[%d]\n",simu->seed_maos);
00474     fprintf(fp,"sim.end=5000\n");
00475     fprintf(fp,"sim.dt=%g\n", parms->maos.dt);
00476     fprintf(fp,"atm.r0z=%.4f\n", parms->maos.r0z);
00477     fprintf(fp,"atm.zadeg=%g\n", parms->maos.zadeg);
00478     fprintf(fp,"atm.size=[128 128]\n");
00479     fprintf(fp,"tomo.split_wt=3\n");
00480     PDMAT(parms->skyc.rnefs,rnefs);
00481     double rne=rnefs[0][seldtrat];
00482     double bkgrnd=aster[selaster].wfs[0].bkgrnd;
00483 
00484     if(parms->maos.npowfs==2){
00485     fprintf(fp, "powfs.piinfile=[\"\" \"pistat\" \"pistat\"]\n");
00486     fprintf(fp, "powfs.neareconfile=[\"\" \"nea_tot\" \"nea_tot\"]\n");
00487     fprintf(fp, "powfs.phyusenea=[0 1 1]\n");
00488     fprintf(fp, "powfs.dtrat=[1 %d %d]\n", parms->skyc.dtrats[seldtrat],
00489         parms->skyc.dtrats[seldtrat]);
00490     fprintf(fp, "powfs.bkgrnd=[0 %.2f %.2f]\n", bkgrnd, bkgrnd);
00491     fprintf(fp, "powfs.rne=[3 %.2f %.2f]\n", rne,rne);
00492     fprintf(fp, "powfs.phystep=[0 %ld %ld]\n", 
00493         (long)50+parms->skyc.dtrats[seldtrat]*20, 
00494         (long)50+parms->skyc.dtrats[seldtrat]*20);
00495     fprintf(fp, "powfs.noisy=[1 1 1]\n");
00496     fprintf(fp, "powfs.pixtheta=[0.5/206265 %g/206265000 %g/206265000]\n",
00497         parms->skyc.pixtheta[0]*206265000,
00498         parms->skyc.pixtheta[1]*206265000);
00499     fprintf(fp, "powfs.pixpsa=[6 %d %d]\n",
00500         parms->skyc.pixpsa[0], 
00501         parms->skyc.pixpsa[1]);
00502     fprintf(fp, "powfs.ncomp=[64 %d %d]\n", 
00503         parms->maos.ncomp[0], parms->maos.ncomp[1]);
00504     fprintf(fp, "powfs.nwvl=[1 %d %d]\n",nwvl,nwvl);
00505     fprintf(fp, "powfs.wvl=[0.589e-6");
00506     for(int ip=0; ip<2; ip++){
00507         for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00508         fprintf(fp, " %.4g", parms->maos.wvl[iwvl]);
00509         }
00510     }
00511     fprintf(fp,"]\n");
00512     }else{
00513     error("Fill this out please\n");
00514     }
00515     fprintf(fp,"sim.servotype_lo=2\n");//type II
00516     fprintf(fp, "sim.gtypeII_lo=\"gain.bin.gz\"\n");
00517     if(parms->maos.wddeg){
00518     fprintf(fp, "atm.wddeg=[");
00519     for(int ips=0; ips<parms->maos.nwddeg; ips++){
00520         fprintf(fp, "%.2f ", parms->maos.wddeg[ips]);
00521     }
00522     fprintf(fp, "]\n");
00523     }
00524     fclose(fp);
00525     snprintf(fnconf,PATH_MAX,"%s/skyres.txt",path);
00526     fp=fopen(fnconf,"w");
00527     fprintf(fp, "%g\t%g\t%g\n",
00528         sqrt(ipres[0])*1e9, sqrt(ipres[1])*1e9, sqrt(ipres[2])*1e9);
00529     fclose(fp);
00530 }
